name: Rat Run (SillyLizardGames)
description:
This is a game where you have been shrunk to around the size of a rat by a mad scientist and have been put in an experiment within a maze. all you have is a Torch and your goal is to get to the end of the maze while avoiding the electric and spike traps. all while your being chased by a rat or multiple rats (Red Capsules) No sound game

Be ready to Leg it
